definition: (bird species of China) blue-fronted robin (Cinclidium frontale)
pinyin: lan2 e2 chang2 jiao3 di4 qu2

definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
(bound form, used in the names of various kinds of bird, esp. robins and redstarts)
